question: Which British officer suppressed the Revolt of 1857 in Lucknow and Bareilly?
explanation: In Lucknow and Bareilly, the revolt of 1857 was led by Begum Hazrat Mahal (the wife of Nawab Wazid Ali Shah of Awadh) and Khan Bahadur Khan (grandson of the last ruler of Rohikhand). But, the revolt was ruthlessly suppressed by Sir Colin Campbell.
